statements: SELECT * FROM flight_logs WHERE flight_id = 1;
SELECT flight_date, distance_km, weather_conditions FROM flight_logs WHERE drone_id = 2;
SELECT pilot_name, duration_minutes FROM flight_logs WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT flight_id, duration_minutes, distance_km FROM flight_logs WHERE weather_conditions = 'Clear';
SELECT * FROM flight_logs WHERE pilot_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM flight_logs WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT drone_id, pilot_name, distance_km FROM flight_logs WHERE weather_conditions = 'Sunny' ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT flight_id, pilot_name, flight_date FROM flight_logs WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY pilot_name ASC, flight_date DESC;
SELECT drone_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM flight_logs GROUP BY drone_id HAVING total_duration > 100;
SELECT * FROM flight_logs WHERE pilot_name LIKE 'John%' AND weather_conditions != 'Rainy' ORDER BY distance_km ASC, flight_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM drone_missions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_date, drone_id FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_duration > 10;
SELECT mission_id, mission_date, target_location FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_id, drone_id, mission_duration FROM drone_missions WHERE target_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM flight_logs WHERE altitude > 1000 AND distance_covered > 500;
SELECT mission_id, mission_date, drone_id, mission_duration, target_location FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_id = 1;
SELECT mission_id, mission_date, drone_id, mission_duration, target_location FROM drone_missions WHERE drone_id = 2 ORDER BY mission_date DESC;
SELECT mission_id, mission_date, drone_id, mission_duration, target_location FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_duration > 60 ORDER BY mission_date ASC;

SELECT mission_id, mission_date, drone_id, mission_duration, target_location FROM drone_missions INNER JOIN flight_logs ON drone_missions.mission_id = flight_logs.mission_id WHERE altitude > 500 ORDER BY distance_covered DESC;

SELECT mission_id, mission_date, drone_id, mission_duration, target_location, flight_start, flight_end, altitude, distance_covered FROM drone_missions INNER JOIN flight_logs ON drone_missions.mission_id = flight_logs.mission_id WHERE target_location LIKE '%forest%' ORDER BY mission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM drone_missions;
SELECT mission_name, start_time, end_time FROM drone_missions WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name FROM drone_missions WHERE start_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT log_id, altitude, speed FROM flight_logs WHERE temperature > 70;
SELECT log_timestamp, flight_duration, battery_level FROM performance_metrics WHERE battery_level < 30;
SELECT * FROM drone_missions;
SELECT mission_name, start_time, end_time FROM drone_missions WHERE drone_id = 3;

SELECT dm.mission_name, fl.altitude, fl.speed, pm.flight_duration FROM drone_missions dm INNER JOIN flight_logs fl ON dm.mission_id = fl.mission_id INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON pm.log_id = fl.log_id;

SELECT dm.mission_name, SUM(pm.flight_duration) AS total_flight_duration FROM drone_missions dm INNER JOIN flight_logs fl ON dm.mission_id = fl.mission_id INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON pm.log_id = fl.log_id GROUP BY dm.mission_name;

SELECT dm.mission_name, fl.altitude, pm.battery_level FROM drone_missions dm LEFT JOIN flight_logs fl ON dm.mission_id = fl.mission_id LEFT JOIN performance_metrics pm ON fl.log_id = pm.log_id WHERE pm.battery_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM drone_missions;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, start_time, mission_status FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_status = 'completed' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT drone_id, flight_duration, battery_level FROM drone_performance WHERE battery_level < 50 ORDER BY battery_level ASC;
SELECT mission_id, flight_date, altitude, distance FROM flight_logs WHERE altitude > 1000 AND distance > 10 ORDER BY flight_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, mission_id, analysis_date, performance_rating FROM mission_analysis WHERE performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_missions
SELECT mission_name, start_time, end_time FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_status = 'Completed'
SELECT mission_name, drone_id, start_time, end_time FROM drone_missions ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT mission_name, drone_id, start_time, end_time FROM drone_missions WHERE mission_id IN (SELECT mission_id FROM flight_logs WHERE altitude > 1000)
SELECT mission_name, drone_id, start_time, end_time FROM drone_missions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_time
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_id, start_location, end_location FROM flights WHERE successful = TRUE;
SELECT model, manufacturer FROM drones ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, model DESC;
SELECT operator_name, contact_email FROM operators LIMIT 3;
SELECT mission_id, start_time, end_time, status FROM missions WHERE status = 'in-progress';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE successful = TRUE;
SELECT start_location, end_location, start_time FROM flights WHERE distance > 1000 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT drones.model, drones.manufacturer, missions.operator_id FROM drones INNER JOIN missions ON drones.drone_id = missions.drone_id;
SELECT AVG(speed), MAX(altitude), MIN(temperature) FROM performance_metrics WHERE flight_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT operators.operator_name, COUNT(missions.mission_id) AS total_missions FROM operators LEFT JOIN missions ON operators.operator_id = missions.operator_id GROUP BY operators.operator_name ORDER BY total_missions DESC;
